title: Strawberry GraphQL types for Tribe
description: Implement `app/graphql/types/tribe.py` with TribeType, TribeMemberType, and OpenRoleType. TribeType fields: id, name, mission, status, max_members, created_at, updated_at. Lazy fields: owner → UserType, members → list[TribeMemberType], open_roles → list[OpenRoleType]. TribeMemberType fields: user → UserType, role, status, joined_at. OpenRoleType fields: id, title, skills_needed, filled.
acceptance_criteria:
- TribeType with all fields and lazy resolvers
- TribeMemberType with user relationship
- OpenRoleType with all fields
- All types reference UserType correctly
- skills_needed (JSONB) mapped correctly
